column2: "That took a really long time. I thought you'd be able to complete it more easily, so I'm a bit surprised."
"Oh, I see... Rappies can't possibly compare to Diggnutts? Sorry, I didn't realize it would be so difficult. "
"Well, I really appreciate the help even though I can't offer you much of a reward. I hope you won't hold it against me."
"And I hope you'll keep helping me when I need it."
